subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1814 is on the way
description_text:

I am checking for an update to this order.

I've used the tracking number but it has not updated with any further
information on the tracking.

Are you able to update me on the status of my order?

Thanks.

Heath Greenland

conversations.body_text: Hi，Heath Greenland，  这是最新的追踪信息。由于我们供应商的零部件短缺，导致您的订单延迟，我们深感抱歉。
